posts.post_title: FS:  a few t206s  - Chase - Ewing
posts.post_content:
FS:  ppff - delivered

I'm looking for Sweet Cap factory 25s to fill in the holes in my collection, so I'm always looking for a good trade.  Let me know what you have.  Offers welcome.

All Chases have the tougher 460.25 back with the trophy being the toughest
Blue cap psa 2.5 - 100
Blue port psa 3 - 105
[STRIKE]Trophy psa 3 - 150[/STRIKE]sold
Blue Cap SGC 40 - big border - $120

Ewing SC.150.25  -  SGC 50 - $85
